text: @ANI Delhi: Wazir Singh, a contractual English teacher at Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya has been selling vegetables to make ends meet as schools are closed due to #COVID19. He says, "I was working as a guest English teacher, we have not been paid since 8th May. This is humiliating". (23.06)
